sqlMap.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, EAISEVRIP, SEVRLSNPORTNAME, FLOVRSEVRNAME, HOSTNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03, (SELECT @NO := 0) R ORDER BY EAISEVRINSTNCNAME ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
SELECT EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISVRINSTNM", EAISEVRIP AS "EAISVRIP", SEVRLSNPORTNAME AS "EAISVRLSNPORT", FLOVRSEVRNAME AS "FAILOVERSVRNM", HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03 LIMIT 1;
